origin_of_ch_char_book: The ancient shamans (or kings) also offered animal sacrifices such as cows or lambs to the gods. These sacrifices were prepared in the huge bronze plates. (ç›£, ç›‘, jian=chien, supervise) This character shows the ceremonial plate, and a figure who is kneeling in front of the plate and watching it very attentively (è¦‹, è§, jian=chien, see; meet with). Inside the ceremonial plate, there is a stroke (), which means the sacrifice. This character shows how careful and attentive he is.,(çœ‹, kan, see; look at) The upside is the hand with 5 fingers (æ‰‹, shou, hand) shading the eye (ç›®, mu, eye). It looks like someone spreads a palm to block the sun and looks around. (è¦‹, è§, jian=chien, see; meet with) consists of an eye and a kneeling person (äºº, ren, human), depicting a subject sees up at the king or a senior, expressing his opinion.,(è§€, è§‚, guan, observe) This symbol is composed of a bird with a mouth on each side and a person watching it carefully (è¦‹, è§, jian=chien, see; meet with). It shows a bird crying or singing loudly and looking around carefully. Such a bird is a stork or crane. The character has also come to mean â€œto observe, to enjoy the scenary.â€

Basic explanation of words
see
(see)
jiÃ n
See: see. rare. See Weizhi book. Be brave to do what is right. Seeing differences and thinking.
Contact, encounter: afraid of seeing the wind. Trainee.
It can be seen, it appears: it works. It pales in comparison.
(Text, etc.) appears somewhere, refer to: see above. See below.
Meeting: See you. Interview.
Observation, knowledge, and understanding of things: insights. Insight (insight). Different people have different opinions (referring to different opinions on the same issue from different angles).
Auxiliary word, which means passive or how to me: see outside. See the teaching. Forgive (forgive me). Laughing (being ridiculed).

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[â‘ ]ï¼»jiÃ nï¼½
["Guangyun" ancient electric cut, go to ha, see you. ]
"See 1" in traditional characters.
(1) See; see.
(2) See you; see you.
(3) Meet; meet.
(4) Refers to interviews.
(5) Encounter; contact.
(6) Insights; insights.
(7) The extension is an idea, a way.
(8) Know; feel.
(9) The extension is discrimination.
(10) Heard; heard; heard.
(11) Contest; contest.
(12) Anticipate; want to see.
(13) Hope; plan.
(14) Used in front of verbs to express passive. It is equivalent to being received.
(15) Used in front of verbs to refer to oneself.
(16) Particles. Indicates that the action continues.
(17) Used after verbs. Indicates the result.
(18) Used in front of verbs. Expresses modesty and politeness.
(19) It is used after quantifiers such as length, width, volume, etc. Represents approximate numbers.
(20) Dialects. Juever. See "Seeing the Sky".
